/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-g++-10 -fPIC  -fPIC -g -Wl,--no-undefined -Wl,--no-allow-shlib-undefined -shared -Wl,-soname,libGraphicsEngineVk.so -o libGraphicsEngineVk.so  -Wl,--whole-archive libDiligent-GraphicsEngineVk-static.a -Wl,--no-whole-archive ../GraphicsEngineNextGenBase/libDiligent-GraphicsEngineNextGenBase.a ../ShaderTools/libDiligent-ShaderTools.a ../HLSL2GLSLConverterLib/libDiligent-HLSL2GLSLConverterLib.a ../GraphicsEngine/libDiligent-GraphicsEngine.a ../GraphicsAccessories/libDiligent-GraphicsAccessories.a ../../Common/libDiligent-Common.a ../../Platforms/Linux/libDiligent-LinuxPlatform.a ../../Platforms/Basic/libDiligent-BasicPlatform.a ../../Primitives/libDiligent-Primitives.a ../../ThirdParty/SPIRV-Cross/libspirv-cross-core.a ../../ThirdParty/glslang/SPIRV/libSPIRV.a ../../ThirdParty/glslang/glslang/libglslang.a ../../ThirdParty/glslang/glslang/libMachineIndependent.a ../../ThirdParty/glslang/glslang/libGenericCodeGen.a ../../ThirdParty/glslang/OGLCompilersDLL/libOGLCompiler.a ../../ThirdParty/glslang/glslang/OSDependent/Unix/libOSDependent.a -pthread ../../ThirdParty/SPIRV-Tools/source/opt/libSPIRV-Tools-opt.a ../../ThirdParty/SPIRV-Tools/source/libSPIRV-Tools.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -ldl
